attributes.additional_details:
To make the world aware of Fake Celebrities and the unfair system which helps them jump the queue to fame.
This is a protest for normal folk who tick all the right boxes and have what it takes to become famous in their chosen profession but are overlooked every time because Fake Celebrities jump the queue and steal their spot.
What are Fake Celebs - Sons, Daughters, Brothers, Sisters and friends of already established celebrities who do not earn the right and often jump the queue in the fame game.
2dp is an aspiring underground rapper who represents the people.
Help me 2dp get famous and we as a collective will totally abolish this unfair system and open the gates for the people who have earned their spot, go to my website now www.2dpfreak.com after signing this form check out my important message and listen to my music!
State in your petition statement that you think 2dp should become famous and give your reasons.
I won't forget you friend!
